description: This file contains utility function declarations, macro definitions, and include directives related to system event handling, network interface management, and process control. It appears to be part of a larger system for managing network services and device configurations.

methods.name: psmGet
methods.description: Retrieves a parameter value from the parameter storage manager.

methods.name: updateDhcpPoolData
methods.description: Updates DHCP pool configuration data, potentially writing to a file.

methods.name: vsystem
methods.description: Executes a shell command with variable arguments.

methods.name: sysctl_iface_set
methods.description: Sets network interface parameters via sysctl.

methods.name: iface_get_hwaddr
methods.description: Retrieves the hardware (MAC) address of a network interface.

methods.name: iface_get_ipv4addr
methods.description: Retrieves the IPv4 address assigned to a network interface.

methods.name: is_iface_present
methods.description: Checks if a network interface is present on the device.

methods.name: serv_can_start
methods.description: Checks whether a service can be started.

methods.name: serv_can_stop
methods.description: Checks whether a service can be stopped.

methods.name: pid_of
methods.description: Finds the process ID of a named process.
